title: [Large-Scale] Utilizing Learning Analytics for Personalized Learning Environment Development

context.prior_knowledge: Foundation in social science knowledge and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Provides personalized feedback through individual learning pattern analysis using smartphones as primary learning tools

learning_goals: Learning analytics can be utilized to diagnose individual learning patterns and areas of weakness.
Personalized learning pathways can be designed based on learning data.
Social studies project topics can be individualized to establish actionable implementation plans.

resources: Zoom and Collaboration Tools (Google Drive, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
